Interface Globe.OnLayersChangedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Globe
    public static interface Globe.OnLayersChangedListener

    • Method Summary

      void onLayerAdded​(Globe mapView, Layer layer)

      • onLayerPositionChanged

        void onLayerPositionChanged​(Globe mapView,
                            Layer layer,
                            int oldPosition,
                            int newPosition)
        Notifies the user when the position of the layer has been explicitly changed. This callback will NOT be invoked when a layer's position changes due to the addition or removal of other layers.
        Parameters:
        mapView - The map view
        layer - The layer
        oldPosition - The layer's old position
        newPosition - The layer's new position
